{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=(My Essentials) ME1004-R |revision= |upc=722868605004 |ean= |asin=B000LZCIXQ |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/13/2006 |manuf_country= |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=K7SF5D7230C |ic_id=3623A-F5D7230C |pwr_v=4.5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=1.5 |pwr_barrel_outer=4.2 |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=29LV800CTTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8010 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Office54g |default_ssid_regex=^Office54g$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:17:3F |oui_eth=00:17:3F |default_ch= }} [http://www.myessentialssupport.com/product/?pid=ME1004-R Support page]
OEM/ODM SerComm (W300A-1.0MM)
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=1327&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15&sid=a2f3adf4aacde8314ab01ad5583d53c6 Internal photos on the DD-WRT forums] (of the F5D7230-4 v6, which is identical)
The power adapter that came with the unit is an OEM AD-041A5. ID/OD measurements are approximate.
